items.sentence: You\'re wearing the ring Tom gave you, aren\'t you?
Tom said that he wanted to talk to me after school.
I\'m not an engineer yet, but I want to become one.
I\'m not as good at playing the trombone as Tom is.
You still haven\'t done what I\'ve asked you to do.
I can\'t believe I agreed to go to Boston with Tom.
I can\'t believe Tom would say something like that.
See to it that the door is locked before you leave.
Tom doesn\'t know Mary, but he\'d like to meet her.
I spend about an hour a day practicing my clarinet.
